費.definition: to cost; to spend; fee; wasteful; expenses

費事.definition: troublesome; to take a lot of trouble to do sth

費力.definition: to expend a great deal of effort

費力不討好.definition: arduous and thankless task (idiom); strenuous and unrewarding

費勁兒.definition: erhua variant of 費勁|费劲[fei4 jin4]

費口舌.definition: to argue needlessly; to waste time explaining

費周折.definition: to spend (much) effort; to go through (a lot of) trouble

費唇舌.definition: to argue needlessly; to waste time explaining

費城.definition: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; abbr. for 費拉德爾菲亞|费拉德尔菲亚[Fei4 la1 de2 er3 fei1 ya4]

費工夫.definition: to spend a great deal of time and effort; (of a task) demanding; exacting

費心.definition: to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth); may I trouble you (to do sth)

費拉德爾菲亞.pinyin: fèi lā dé ěr fēi yà
費拉德爾菲亞.definition: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; abbr. to 費城|费城[Fei4 cheng2]

費曼.definition: Feinman or Feynman (name); Richard Feynman (1918-1988), US physicist, 1965 Nobel prize laureate together with TOMONAGA Shin'ichirō and Julian Schwinger

費爾干納.definition: the Ferghana Valley (in Uzbekistan, central Asia)

費爾干納盆地.pinyin: fèi ěr gàn nà pén dì
費爾干納盆地.definition: the Ferghana Valley in modern Uzbekistan

費用.definition: cost; expenditure; expense; CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]

費盡心思.definition: to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through

費盡心機.definition: to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom); to beat one's brains out

費神.definition: to spend effort; to take trouble; May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request); Please would you mind...?

費米.definition: Fermi (name); Enrico Fermi (1901-1954), Italian born US nuclear physicist

費縣.definition: Feixian county in Linyi 臨沂|临沂[Lin2 yi2], Shandong

費解.definition: to be puzzled; hard to understand; unintelligible; incomprehensible

費話.definition: to talk at length; to waste one's breath; variant of 廢話|废话[fei4hua4]
